sentence.Network_en: They also included the export of Tasmanian pademelon wallaby products from Flinders Island.
sentence.Network_cn: 计划中还包括,允许出口芬林得岛的塔斯玛尼亚沙袋鼠产品.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...树袋鼠(tree-kangaroo)，短尾灰沙袋鼠(Quokka)与小沙袋鼠(pademelon)等(在欧洲人开始在澳洲开垦以前，共有53个袋鼠科物种.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent. (earlier as paddymelon): probably an alteration of Dharuk badimalion

means.word_mean: 1. small reddish-brown wallabies of scrubby areas of Australia and New Guinea
